name: Weiguo Wang (王伟国)
description:
Biography: I'm currently a Staff Engineer at NIO, Technology Planning. I obtained my Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University, advised by [Prof. Yuan He](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/members/YuanHe). I received my B.S. degree from UESTC in 2018. My research interests include mobile computing, wireless sensing and communication with especial focus on acoustics. I am enjoying building proof-of-concepts for innovative applications, encompassing both hardware and software aspects.
E-Mail: weiguo.wang2@nio.com   wangwg1996@qq.com   wwg18@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn
